title: A Tip for Recovering Games you are Losing
body:
One of the strategies I use to collect gold and recover games where top lane or all lanes are losing

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WsO1hyDot_o

replies.body:
This heimer dont stun you after your alpha strike inside his ult ? you're garanteed to be straight over him after the alpha strike, there is no way he could miss it and kill you every time.

Also, if you are that heimer, never go ahead with the 3 turrets placed around you, that heimer was just careless...
thats the point he was incredibly overconfident because he was winning lane hard.
